title: T213-2 Coupon (3) all Ex graded: McGraw, Dunn and Hofman
author: nolemmings

posts.post_title: T213-2 Coupon (3) all Ex graded: McGraw, Dunn and Hofman
posts.post_content:
T213-2 Coupons are tough to find in this grade, and none of these three has been graded higher:

$550.00  McGraw Glove at Side PSA 5 (highest PSA, one SGC 60)  
$260.00  Jack Dunn (photo Joe) SGC 60 (none as high or higher)    
$250.00  Solly Hofman (Brooklyn Fed) PSA 5 (none as high or higher)

Shipping on me; regular paypal fine, inquiries do not comprise placeholders (i.e., others can accept regardless if you've received a response)

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/imoverhere/prewar/t2132coupon/t2132coupon/huge/t213-2mcgraw.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/imoverhere/prewar/t2132coupon/t2132coupon/huge/t213dunn.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/imoverhere/prewar/t2132coupon/t2132coupon/huge/t213hofman.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks for looking
Sale completed.... beautiful cards and thank you very much..... the usual run around at the Post Office..... but all is well and again best wishes in your collecting endeavors.     Rocky
Damn, awesome cards.  Congrats to the lucky SOB who now owns these
